name: DOJOLVI
indications: dojolvi indicated source calories fatty acids treatment adult pediatric patients molecularly confirmed long-chain fatty acid oxidation disorders ( lc-faod ) .
contraindications: assess metabolic requirements determining daily caloric intake ( dci ) prior calculating dose dojolvi . ( 2.1 ) patients receiving another medium-chain triglyceride product , discontinue prior first dose dojolvi . ( 2.3 ) recommended target daily dojolvi 35 % patient 's total prescribed dci divided least four doses mixed thoroughly semi-solid food/liquid medical food/formula mealtimes snacks . ( 2.2 ) full prescribing information instructions calculate volume per dose ; initiate titrate achieve target ; prepare administer dojolvi . ( 2.2 , 2.3 , 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions: dojolvi ( triheptanoin ) oral liquid supplied glass bottle follows : 500 ml bottle ndc 69794-050-50
indications_original: DOJOLVI is indicated as a source of calories and fatty acids for the treatment of adult and pediatric patients with molecularly confirmed long-chain fatty acid oxidation disorders (LC-FAOD).
contraindications_original: Assess metabolic requirements by determining daily caloric intake (DCI) prior to calculating the dose of DOJOLVI. ( 2.1 ) For patients receiving another medium-chain triglyceride product, discontinue prior to the first dose of DOJOLVI. ( 2.3 ) The recommended target daily dosage of DOJOLVI is up to 35% of the patient's total prescribed DCI divided into at least four doses and mixed thoroughly into semi-solid food/liquid or medical food/formula at mealtimes or with snacks. ( 2.2 ) See the full prescribing information for instructions on how to calculate the volume per dose; initiate and titrate the dosage to achieve the target; and prepare and administer DOJOLVI. ( 2.2 , 2.3 , 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
DOJOLVI (triheptanoin) oral liquid is supplied in a glass bottle as follows:
                  
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           500 mL bottle
                           NDC 69794-050-50
